# Illumination (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** strong evocation; **CL** 15th

**Slot** none

**Price** 51,500 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

This staff is usually sheathed in silver and decorated with sunbursts. It allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Dancing Lights (Spell)|Dancing lights]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Flare (Spell)|Flare]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Daylight (Spell)|Daylight]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Sunburst (Spell)|Sunburst]]* (3 charges)

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]], *[[Dancing Lights (Spell)|dancing lights]], [[Daylight (Spell)|daylight]], [[Flare (Spell)|flare]], [[Sunburst (Spell)|sunburst]]*

**Cost** 20,750 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 494
